page.title: 06HARDWICK COMMUNITY SCHOOL
page.content: The school has been open for six years It started off with 33 children,3 teachers and 4 classrooms.Now there 230 children and 10 teachers.There is also a general assistant who works with the infants and the school secretary.There is a dinner staff of 6.Nearly every day there are clubs held in school such as gym club,bowls, badminton,gardening club,youth club, keep fit,karate and Sunday school.The school is open to the public because it is a community school and the villagers helped to build it by paying towards it.There is a school caretaker who lives in the village.She is responsible for cleaning and looking after the school. Children come to school from 9.00 am to 3.30 pm with 1 hour 15 minutes off for lunch.The pupils start school at 4 1/2 and leave to go to secondary school at 11.
